derivation: from H142 (אָדַר) and H4428 (מֶלֶךְ); splendor of (the) king;
outline:
Adrammelech = "honour of the king"
  1. class='lex2'>or "Adar is prince"
  2. class='lex2'>or "Adar is Counsellor, Decider"
  • an idol or god of the Sepharvites, introduced to Israel by Shalmaneser the fifth
  • the son and murderer of Sennacherib
strongs_def: Adrammelek, the name of an Assyrian idol, also of a son of Sennacherib
